name: Moto Off Road - Hill Rider
description:
Moto Off Road - Hill Rider is an exciting and realistic offroad bike racing game. Ride and stunt your Bike on dangerous mountains , downhill & hilly roads.Pass through some challenging levels like swampy mud track, every level. Show your skills as you are the best bike racer,in this fun game Offroad moto hill bike rush.
Features:-

• Different weathers- Day, Night, Rain, Sunshine, Sunset
• Multiple Bikes, Different Camera views
• Exciting environment with detailed graphics!
• Realistic motorbike physics and sound effects.
